p: AHL = IF [HLI < HLILT, (HLI–HLILT)/M], IF [HLI > HLIUT, (HLI–HLIUT)/M, 0)], where HLILT is the HLI threshold below which cattle will dissipate heat (here, 81 for crossbred cattle), HLIUT is the HLI threshold above which cattle will gain heat (here, 90 for crossbred cattle), and M the number of measurements per hour (here M = 2, Bohmanova, Misztal, & Cole, 2007).
